definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: I asked to get buddied up with an experienced diver .
sentences.chinese: 我要求和有經驗的潛水員搭檔。

sentences.english: A mini-submarine was called in to help the search for bodies, along with divers.
sentences.chinese: 一艘微型潛艇被徵召，以配合潛水員搜索屍體。

sentences.english: The scuba diver submerged and swarm toward a coral reef.
sentences.chinese: 戴着呼吸器的潛水員潛入水底，朝珊瑚礁遊了過去。

sentences.english: Divers participated in the construction process.
sentences.chinese: 參與工程建設的潛水員們。

sentences.english: Five divers descended daily to look for teh remains of the ship.
sentences.chinese: 每天五名潛水員下潛到水下尋找船隻的殘骸。

sentences.english: Sand Diver fish can often be identified by a dark spot on the gill cover of the fish.
sentences.chinese: 沙魚潛水員通常可以由一個黑點確定對魚鰓蓋。

sentences.english: Coastguards had given up all hope of finding the two divers alive.
sentences.chinese: 海岸警衛隊對兩位潛水員生還已完全不抱希望。

sentences.english: Often boaters can’t see divers in the water.
sentences.chinese: 船員們經常看不到水中的潛水員。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the relationship between cerebral blood flow and neuropsychology in divers.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解潛水員腦血流改變和神經心理學變化的關係。

sentences.english: A Submariner said, He is new here.
sentences.chinese: 個潛水員說，他是新來旳。

sentences.english: A diver is swimming with two white whales under icebergs in the White Sea, Russia.
sentences.chinese: 一個潛水員正與兩條白鯨在俄羅斯的冰山下游泳。

sentences.english: Divers often play with white whales who seem to show off.
sentences.chinese: 潛水員常常炫耀與白鯨玩。

sentences.english: Divers at international competitions routinely hold their breath 4-7 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 在國際競爭中的潛水員一般屏息4到7分鐘。

sentences.english: As in the ocean, the diver may disappear there.
sentences.chinese: 就象在大澤裏一樣，潛水員也能在下水道里失蹤。

sentences.english: A diver swims with a moray eel during a press preview at the Sunshine Aquarium in Tokyo.
sentences.chinese: 在東京的陽光水族館，潛水員與熱帶海鰻與媒體見面。

sentences.english: Photo Gallery: Underwater Landscapes A diver explores wire coral in Japan's Suruga Bay.
sentences.chinese: 一名潛水員探討金屬絲珊瑚在日本的駿河灣。

definition: to remain calm in the face of events (idiom)
zookeeper/stockman/breeder (of livestock, dogs or poultry etc)
to cut ties/to disconnect/out of touch
